name: Sauce Vierge
keywords: extra virgin olive oil, herbs, tomato
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon chopped fresh chervil or 1 teaspoon dried
2 teaspoons chopped fresh tarragon or 1/2 teaspoon dried
1 teaspoon whole coriander seeds, crushed or 1 teaspoon ground
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in blender or food processor and process until well blended. Taste,adjusting seasoning if necessary.
Pour into warm bowl and set in saucepan of hot water. Set aside to keep warm. Flavors will develop on standing.
Sauce should be served lukewarm, not hot.
